instruction.value: Place tablet under the tongue at first sign of angina symptoms. May repeat dose at 5 minute intervals until relief is obtained.
Administer 5 minutes prior to engaging in an activity which may precipitate an acute angina attack.
Administer 10 minutes prior to engaging in an activity which may precipitate an acute angina attack.

additionalnotes.value: Prompt medical attention is recommended if pain persists after a total of 3 tablets in a 15 minute period.
